Title: airport 13th crossswalks
Description:
Airport Way

Goal:

Crosswalks on Airport Way

Status:

In Progress

Progress Detail:

Cross walk added at the new traffic light (Stanley and Airport)

Challenges and barriers:

Getting a pedestrian-operated light across Airport Way requires 200 people/hour. Not enough traffic to get city to install.

Next Steps:

Provide red crossing flags for pedestrians.
